attributes.action: We, the British people, demand the introduction of PR to replace FPTP
attributes.additional_details: 43.6% of those who voted in the 2019 General Election voted Tory. That means that 56.4% of those who voted don't want Tories. We are ignoring the majority opinion and PR will give us that.
attributes.background: PR allows everyone's vote to count and not be ignored like under FPTP. Most successful democracies have a form of PR.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Change the voting system from First Past the Post to Proportional Representation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601055
